name: Maze Of The Gamja
description:
Solve Gamja-puzzles and Acquire Gamja-knowledges!

Maze Of The Gamja is a puzzle game that can be played with a keyboard or mouse.

Move up, down, left, right, or activate the surrounding blocks to open a new path.

Each action will reduce the count and all sweet potatoes must be obtained before the count reaches zero.

There are 66 Gamja-puzzles, 193 Gamja-photos, and 75 Gamja-knowledge!
